Description:
Stop Dreaming & Build!
Situated in thriving Creswick, this attractive family sized block of land on approx. 725m2 is the ideal spot for building your dream home (STCA). With all services ready to connect and fencing to all internal boundaries, you would be hard pressed to find a better block on the market today!
Creswick offers everything you will need right at your door step. From the supermarket to cosy cafes, and from highly rated Government and Catholic primary schools to handy buses and the V/Line Service to Melbourne, all the bases are covered for you here.
With a short 15 minute drive to the centre of Ballarat, 20 minutes to the spas and restaurants of Beautiful Dayslesford and easy access to Melbourne via the Western Freeway, this block really does stack up as a great opportunity for the astute purchaser.
• Flat and easy to build block
• Close to all amenities
• Internal fencing included
• All services ready to connect

Description:
A special and totallly unique home!
Perfectly positioned walking distance to both Lake Calembeen and the Creswick town village, this somewhat edgy and special home has been extended to create a home that is guaranteed to impress. Offering a generous block size of approx. 1300sqm, the home is surrounded by picture perfect gardens that create a private sanctuary with plenty of room to move. The home offers a fantastically flexible floorplan, with options for dual occupancy, holiday accommodation or simply a large single residence. The original cottage comprises 2 bedrooms, a lounge, kitchenette and bathroom/laundry. The extension offers a large open plan living area, the well-appointed kitchen (stainless steel appliances including 900mm cooker and a dishwasher) and the master bedroom that’s complete with an ensuite and walk-in-robe. Features include polished timber floors, double glazing, high ceilings throughout, a gas log fire, 2 split system ac units and many period features. Outside a large timber deck with a pergola overlooks the gardens - just perfect for outdoor living. A meandering brick pathway leads to the rear of the garden, where you will find a garden shed and water tank. Creswick is ideally located approx. 20 mins to both Ballarat and Daylesford, and is easily accessed from Melbourne via the Western Hwy. The great village atmosphere makes this a great place to call home, or to escape to on the weekends. Please contact Phil Hayward on 0419107112 to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: 25 Drummond Street, Creswick VIC 3363 was last sold in 2019 and 45 other 3 bedroom house in Creswick have recently been sold.

Description:
Invest now or occupy later!
Set on a spacious block of approx. 1004sqm with both front and rear access, this property offers potential for the investor, developer (STCA) or owner occupier. The home is currently leased until August 2019, returning $230 per week. Neatly presented the home offers 3 bedrooms, a generous lounge, kitchen/dining, a central bathroom and a sunroom. Features include gas heating and a 7m x 6m garage. For an inspection contact Phil Hayward on 0419107112

Description:
A complete lifestyle package – superb North Location!
Boasting a superb location only 10 minute’s drive North of Ballarat, this 7-acre (approx.) lifestyle property is also only a short drive to the nearby amenities of Creswick. The renovated home offers four bedrooms including a large master complete with walk-in-robe and modern ensuite – and all remaining bedrooms have built in robes. The modern family bathroom has also been recently renovated. Featuring cathedral ceilings – there are two generously proportioned living areas along with a modern open plan kitchen that features stone bench-tops, quality stainless steel appliances with windows overlooking the pool. Year-round comfort is assured with both wood heating and split system heating/cooling. A massive undercover outdoor living area is equipped for year-round use with its timber decking, open fire-place, exposed beams and electric drop down blinds. The solar heated pool and spa are perfectly positioned to complete the resort style feel. Shedding infrastructure includes a double garage, a 10.8m x 7.6m lock up shed with power and a 8m x 20m lock up shed makes this property a fantastic option for tradies or anyone needing a truck friendly property. The land is fully fenced with a large dam, and services include, electricity and NBN is connected. Tank water storage offers approx. 100,000L. With lifestyle packages such as this rarely found – contact Phil Hayward on 0419107112 to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Exciting Investment Opportunity
Uniquely designed with corrugated iron & offering a completely open floor plan, this modern home offers Moore' than just a place to live.
Sitting slightly elevated to the street and providing excellent views across Hammon Park Oval, this property certainly accommodates for growing families with plenty opportunities to fulfil your exercise regime, train your pets or kick footy with views directly from your lounge/dining & kitchen.
The terraced back yard is suitably designed for the ultimate privacy with a well protected alfresco & deck perfectly placed for private gatherings. There is a high fence to the back of the allotment with towering gums keeping the country outlook.
Only 8 years old and offering timber floors, stainless steel appliances & a neutral palette, this home boasts three robed bedrooms including a master suite with ensuite, a family bathroom with shower, vanity & separate toilet along with a split system for keeping the home at a comfortable temperature.
This 15 square home feels so much bigger, with minimal dividing walls & loads of light from every direction. For further information, please contact our agent today.

Description:
Charming Cottage, Beautiful Gardens & 15 Picturesque Acres
Likely to be this years most charismatic property, it is a must for those seeking a little of yester-year charm, stunning country views and a wondrous sense of space. The main dwelling with stunning northern views boasts polished floorboards, colonial and Victorian windows and many more features. There is one spacious bedroom with much appeal, lounge with fire place and a sun room with French door access. There is also an independent apartment-guest room with kitchen and bedroom and an optional living. The gardens will delight all year round. Those looking for the weekender or B&B will find the surrounds appealing. The 15 acres holds 8 paddocks, 200 year old gum trees, stables, workshops and an abundance of shedding. All this just 5 minutes to the hub of Creswick and 20 minutes to Daylesford.

Description:
QUAINT MINERS COTTAGE IN CENTRAL TALBOT
Located a very short walk to the Talbot Railway station and shops is this adorable two bedroom miners cottage located on a generous block with rear and front access. Upon entry is the living area with wood heating and split system to keep you comfortable during all climates. The kitchen offers a central dining area with gas cooking. Two bedrooms, the master is enormous with built-in robes and the second bedroom also offers built-in robes. The bathroom has been updated and is neat and tidy with shower and toilet. The laundry has great scope with loads of space to perhaps add an extra room. Enclosed yard and further fenced off paddock to the back of the property with rear gate access. There is a single powered and concreted LUG with storage area, further garden shed, water tank and lovely established gardens. Don't miss out on this one in popular Talbot. A great investment, weekender or permanent residence.
Contact Alisa Johnson at our Maryborough office on 0409935766 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Character filled family home on 1100m2
This period style gem is just over 1km to Creswick’s centre and metres from the sporting ground, as well as the train station, hospital and schools. Featuring three bedrooms (the master with walk in robe & ensuite), plus study, two spacious living rooms, family bathroom, plus a neat updated kitchen which boasts additional wood oven to bake perfect sponge cakes! Also wood combustion heater, split system aircon, plus gas heating for year round comfort. A fantastic outdoor entertaining area is fully enclosed with a built in bar, there’s a good size shed for vehicles and workshop space, plus plenty of yard being on a large allotment with established gardens, fruit trees and vege patches. Great value with plenty of room for growing families.

Description:
Renovated charmer, enjoy a cup of tea on the veranda!
This cottage is one to love, sweet and unassuming from the street, then opens up to modern, renovated and sun filled delight. Located just a few 100 meters from thriving Central Creswick, this historic period cottage has been fully restored to its former glory for functional living. Boasting an impressive list of modern inclusions, yet the renovation still retains its charm from yesteryear intact throughout. A positively charming facade with jarrah front deck, stain glass window throwing kaleidoscope colour into the high calibre bathroom, polished hardwood floors and original feature wood stove in the now updated kitchen featuring caeserstone bench tops, and quality stainless steel appliances (a Westinghouse stove/cook top plus a Fisher and Paykel dishwasher). Both bedrooms are generous in size, making for the perfect weekend getaway or short stay accommodation options. The rear north facing decking provides a tranquil, private setting overlooking the fully landscaped yard. An inspection is simply a must, and will not disappoint.

Description:
CREATE YOUR OWN WEEKENDER
Get lost in your own Sanctuary! This private 23 acre bush block is ideal for those looking for a project or wishing to create a weekend retreat. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas and a separate bathroom - this house is simply craving love and attention. With Solid bones, septic sewer and tank water connected you could turn this old house into your own escape from life.
The property boasts a great dam with good catchment, a small shed, shipping container and boundary fencing. A generator (which stays with the property) currently provides power while those with the means and know how could build an adequate solar or battery system if you were looking to live in this home more permanently.
If it’s nature you crave, riding motorbikes, bushwalking or simple privacy this property is certainly worth a look. Located 40 Minutes from the Ballarat CBD, 16km from Clunes and just up the road from the Talbot reservoir –this property could be the haven you have been seeking.

Description:
Picture perfect
Located in the small hamlet of Kingston, 10 minutes from Creswick or 20 minutes from Daylesford, this delightful weatherboard cottage sits back from the road on a good size block with a low maintenance garden. The home welcomes you into a bright open plan living, dining and kitchen area with a wood log fire and reverse cycle split system. It features 2 bedrooms both with built in robes and a study with French doors onto the verandah. There is a central bathroom with separate toilet and good size separate laundry. The property has ample back garden to establish further or turn into an outside entertaining area. The property is within easy walking distance to the Commercial Hotel circa 1905 or grab a French pastry at Le Peche Gourmand in Creswick. Kingston sits in the amazing Hepburn Shire with all it has to offer. This property is ideal for a permanent home, weekender or holiday rental property that won’t disappoint.
Features:
• Weatherboard cottage with front and side verandah
• Front picket fence
• Open plan living, dining and kitchen with wood fire and reverse cycle system,
• 2 bedrooms both with built in robes
• Study with French doors onto verandah
• 1 central bathroom
• 1 separate toilet
• Laundry
• Garage for 1 car but ample length in drive for 2- 3 other cars
• A lean to shed
• Clothes line
• Low maintenance garden

Description:
COUNTRY DWELLING IN POPULAR TALBOT
Located on a generous corner block, in popular Talbot and only minutes walk to the township shops and monthly market is 9 Lansdowne Street. Offering a well maintained home ideal for a new resident for full time or as a weekender with 3 bedrooms, 2 super huge with built in robes. In the lounge room, views to the gardens, exposed cathedral beams along with freestanding wood heater , electric heater and air conditioning. Kitchen is well appointed with electric cooking and dishwasher, with space for dining. Walk through to elevated undercover private aspect decking area. The yard has established gardens, single garage and also carport, great spot for parking the caravan. Arrange to view if this has caught your attention.

Description:
Sweet Victorian With Country Views in Historic Township
Whether you're seeking a B&B, weekender or a tree change this pretty property in popular Allendale is sure to tease the senses. This wondrous abode is full of Victorian character and its country outlooks need to be seen by all. All bedrooms are generous and while there is both a charismatic formal lounge, there's also a comfy open plan kitchen, meals and living area that looks back over the sunsets. A bungalow towards the rear of the property could also be a gym or studio. The residence sits on a spacious 1851m2 allotment. All this within twenty minutes to Daylesford or ten back into friendly Creswick community.

Description:
13.33HA (32.94 Acres) Well Located & Extensively Improved
Relax with all the creature comforts on this private and picturesque 33 Acre property, located in a highly convenient location less than 40 minute drive from Ballarat. Abundant improvements (but not limited to) include 30' x 25' shed with concrete floor and wood heater, accommodating living/kitchenette, workshop areas and a fully lined & insulated bedroom. Outside is a separate shower with a wood fired hot water service and a separate composting toilet. Water is supplied by way of three rainwater tanks and there is a two panel solar system plus a diesel generator (included in the sale) for power when it is needed. There are a number of enclosures on the property that are suitable for containing animals. Gently undulating, the land is highly picturesque and features a well sited catchment dam and a pleasing blend of timbered and areas of native pastures. A highly improved and well situated week-end getaway/investment that is located within easy reach of many popular tourist destinations and is assured to delight!
Insights: 1067 Lexton-Talbot Road, Burnbank VIC 3371 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
A Rural Paradise Just Moments From Town
Residential allotments don't come as perfectly packaged as this magnificent & substantial 7,483m2 block, privately set along a tree lined road on the fringe of beautiful Creswick.
Just moments to the centre of town, a quick 15 minute commute into Ballarat, 20 minutes to Daylesford & an easy connection with the Western Freeway via the Midland Highway, this stunning lifestyle parcel of land provides an opportunity to bring your dream to life.
From the moment you drive through the rustic timber farm gates you will be struck by the serenity & space afforded to you. With close to 2 acres of land, the sky is truly the limit to what you can achieve, building your dream home with space for almost anything more that your heart desires.
The property also has the scope for future subdivision (STCA), with a conditional planning permit for a 3 Lot subdivision in place.

Description:
Surprising Large Home & Land in Creswick
This terrific property truly fits the bill as a lifestyle property. The home is situated on approximately 7900m2. This block is zoned residential and three sides of the parcel facing road access. The western red cedar home is bigger inside than you expect. There are four large bedrooms, two generous living areas and an ensuite to the master. The home requires a small amount of cosmetic surgery which mostly involves carpet replacement. The residence has splendid outlooks in every direction although only being two minutes back into the hub of town. Give your family the chance to enjoy a lifestyle of space, convenience and relaxation.

Description:
Great Building Block In Handy Location
Sitting on the corner of Ballarat Road (frontage 14.22m) and Hyde Park Road (frontage 29.15m), this 503m2 allotment offers the perfect site to begin your dream home or add to your investment port folio by constructing a fabulous townhouse or two (STCA).
This superb block lies within walking distance to the elegantly curved picturesque main street of Creswick, which is just 16kms North of Ballarat and neighbouring the iconic tourism regions of Clunes, Daylesford, the Hepburn spa country, and the Macedon Ranges. The block has recently been fenced, with all services available, including internet connection, this vacant site on offers public transport facilities close by along with a bitumen surface to both roads which does provide the opportunity to consider more than a family home.
For further details and rate information, please contact our agent asap.

Description:
Rare Small Acreage in Rocklyn with Large Dam
Located 20 minutes to Ballarat and 15 minutes to spa country Daylesford this picturesque farming block boast highly productive red soil. Approx. 23 acres with a 14MG spring fed dam this land was used for rose growing and currently stock grazing. Situated in a Farming zoning this rare small acreage would be ideal for tiny homes, orchard, shedding or camping/recreational use.
- Approx. 23 mostly level acres, Farming Zone (FZ)
- Approx. 14MG spring fed dam
- Sealed road frontage with mains power nearby
- Fully fenced with farm fencing, established shelter trees
Inspections by prior appointment, drive by available.

Description:
Sensational Country Property with Great Office Space
Located just out of Creswick town centre sits this impressive family home perfect for the growing family! A home that doesn't compromise the necessities and has everything required to ensure comfort all year round. The home comprises three large living areas including front formal lounge, open plan kitchen / meals / living area with views to the backyard and beyond and a large rumpus room with built in bar and built in theatre chairs that has direct access to the large undercover alfresco area and in built salt water pool. Offering four bedrooms two of which incorporate walk in robes and the remaining with built in robes, study/5th bedroom also incorporating built in robes and the master bedroom of king sized proportions with full ensuite and separate toilet. Outside the property continues to exceed all expectations being situated on a huge 16 acres with ample shedding, office space that is the ideal space to run a business from home with kitchenette and toilet. This property needs to be seen to be believed; call today to book your private viewing.

Description:
Wondrous Setting For Charming Victorian On Spacious Block
This is an exciting opportunity for you to secure the space for your growing family. The charming Victorian is situated on a picturesque half acre block, with an extraordinary opportunity to lease the adjoining 3.5 acre crown allotment for only $65 per annum. The abode has three generous bedrooms, large living and an updated kitchen. There is a great feel to the home, but there's still scope for you to add a little flair. Outside you will find fantastic shedding with a 6x12 meter garage taking all your vehicles and still granting workshop space. Broken into three paddocks the property is ideal for family activities or a couple of livestock. This terrific lifestyle is had just 2 minutes from the Creswick hub of town and just over 20 minutes to Daylesford.
